attributes.action: restore law and order to the uk by bringing back some sense and fear of justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country is a shadow of it's former self, no fear of law and justice, no respect for each other, no respect for the Police, it is about time we brought back sensible decisions on how to Police people who regularly make other people's lives a misery.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
